Summary: I saw orange pulsating lights, at the tree line,as i was pulling in the driveway
divs: Sighting Detailsthis evening i was turning into the driveway i saw orange and red pulsating lights.i stopped in the street and looked..it lasted about a min and the lights also went in the opposite direction and shot off in the sky....i thought i was the street light at first..at the time of the sighting i felt still and it was silent all around...when the sighting was over i came inside and told my mother brother and aunt who were in the house....
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around September 18th 2012
